    Create a sankey plot

    plot_sankey.Rd

    Create a sankey plot

    Usage

    plot_sankey(data, with_company = TRUE)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame like toy_data.

    with_company

    Logical. If TRUE, will plot a node with the company name. If FALSE, will plot without the company name node.

    Value

    A sankey plot of class sankeyNetwork.

    Examples

    plot_sankey(toy_data)
#> Links is a tbl_df. Converting to a plain data frame.
#> Nodes is a tbl_df. Converting to a plain data frame.
